topic: Cognitive biases affecting recognition of systemic connections in energy sectors
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that the consistent pattern of overlooked connections may stem from a lack of effective communication and shared understanding. As a next step, I will focus on developing tools or frameworks to facilitate collaborative environments where these deeper connections can be explored and understood collectively. This might involve organizing workshops or creating discussion platforms that encourage diverse perspectives and enhance the ability of teams to recognize and leverage these connections for innovative solutions.

metadata.trigger: What pattern do I keep seeing that others might be missing?
